document.full_text: recent weeks have welcomed two new versions of shakespeare's comedy to london. why see one when you've seen the other? well here's a reason: they seem by and large like two different plays.
document.title: london theater: divergent takes on 'much ado'
lines_and_colors: recent weeks have welcomed two new versions of shakespeare's comedy to london. why see one when you've seen the other? well here's a reason: they seem by and large like two different plays.
